## WebjsContext interface

This type specifies the shape of the object passed to DOM features scripts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WebjsContext<O extends {}, P> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [options](./webshell.webjscontext.options.md) | O | The options to customize the script behavior. |

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [warn(message)](./webshell.webjscontext.warn.md) | Safely post a warn message to the console. |
